${ModID}:TheRod.NAME: The Rod
${ModID}:TheRod.FLAVOR: The only one of its kind.
DESCRIPTIONS: After drawing your first hand each combat, add a #y${ModID}:Fish into your hand, draw pile, and discard pile.

${ModID}:RainbowRod.NAME: Rainbow Rod
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL At the end of each turn, shuffle #b2 #y${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:BrokenOar.NAME: Broken Oar
${ModID}:BrokenOar.FLAVOR: Most trips to the Spire are one-way anyways.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Draw #b1 fewer card each turn.

${ModID}:DNAVial.NAME: DNA Vial
${ModID}:DNAVial.FLAVOR: Interesting implications about Snecko and Snake Plant.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b2 times you play a #y${ModID}:Fish each combat, shuffle an #yUpgraded copy into your draw pile.

${ModID}:SpareBait.NAME: Spare Bait
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if your hand is empty, gain #b1 #yStrength.

${ModID}:UnageeSkull.NAME: Unagee Skull
${ModID}:UnageeSkull.FLAVOR: They say this terrifying beast used to guard sunken ships.

${ModID}:Signpost.NAME: Signpost
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #yMessage into your hand.

${ModID}:Starshield.NAME: Starshield
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card with a star in its art, gain #b1 #yBlock.

${ModID}:WornCoat.NAME: Worn Coat
${ModID}:WornCoat.FLAVOR: They say Captain Abe rocked this.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #y${ModID}:Fish enters your discard pile, gain #b4 #yBlock.
